enemies.description: A merciless lieutenant of Lif, returned from beyond.

win.narration: The defeat of Skull scatters the vengeful spirits that haunted the place.

loose.narration: Skull's cursed blade finds you before you can react, and your soul joins his army.

enemies.description: Capable of reanimating the dead and creating an army from the beyond.

win.narration: By putting an end to Skal’s rituals, you stop the rising tide of the dead.

loose.narration: Skal murmurs an incantation, and dead hands pull you underground.

enemies.description: Harvester of wandering souls, strengthening Lif’s ranks.

win.narration: The fall of Grim puts an end to the harvesting of innocent souls.

loose.narration: Grim’s blades envelop you in a veil of darkness, sealing your fate.

enemies.description: A specialist in illusions and manipulations, works to disorient the enemies of the King of the Dead.

win.narration: By outsmarting Eldrin’s illusions, you bring clarity back to the Dark Crypts.

loose.narration: Eldrin’s illusions overwhelm you, losing you in a labyrinth of your own mind.

enemies.description: Master of darkness and sovereign of the beyond, draws his power from the suffering of souls.

win.narration: In defeating Lif, you have dispelled the shadows that enveloped the crypts.

loose.narration: Lif crushes you under the weight of tortured souls, plunging the world into eternal darkness.
